name: Extraire des contacts √† partir de cartes de visite vers Google Sheets avec GPT4o
description:
# üìÑ Extraction automatique des contacts √† partir de cartes de visite vers Sheet avec GPT4o
[![Regardez la vid√©o](https://s3.ap-southeast-1.amazonaws.com/automatewith.me/n8n-free-workflow-to-auto-generate-leads-from-name-cards.jpg)](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=2EWgC5UKiBQ)
> Ce flux de travail intelligent extrait les noms, num√©ros de t√©l√©phone, e-mails, et plus encore √† partir des photos de cartes de visite t√©l√©charg√©es en utilisant l'IA, puis les enregistre soigneusement dans votre Google Sheet. Pas de saisie. Pas de d√©sordre. Il suffit de t√©l√©charger et d'y aller.

## üë§ Pour qui est-ce

- √âquipes de vente et de d√©veloppement commercial  
- Recruteurs et sp√©cialistes de l'acquisition de talents  
- √âquipes d'√©v√©nements collectant des cartes de visite  
- Administrateurs qui g√®rent manuellement des bases de donn√©es de contacts  

## ‚öôÔ∏è Comment cela fonctionne / Ce que cela fait

Ce flux de travail automatise l'extraction des d√©tails de contact √† partir des images de cartes de visite t√©l√©charg√©es et les stocke dans un Google Sheet structur√© pour un suivi et un suivi faciles.

### √âtapes du flux de travail :
1. L'utilisateur t√©l√©charge une ou plusieurs images de cartes de visite via un formulaire web.
2. Les fichiers t√©l√©charg√©s sont enregistr√©s dans un dossier Google Drive pour archivage.
3. Un agent IA intelligent (avec des capacit√©s OCR et GPT) scanne chaque image et extrait les donn√©es de contact pertinentes au format JSON structur√©.
4. Les donn√©es sont transform√©es, nettoy√©es (par exemple, suppression du `+` des num√©ros de t√©l√©phone) et filtr√©es.
5. Les contacts valides sont ajout√©s √† un Google Sheet pour un suivi central et une utilisation future.

## üõ† Comment configurer

1. **Cr√©er un formulaire**  
   - Autoriser le t√©l√©chargement de fichiers (format JPG/PNG).
   - √âtiquetez-le comme ¬´ T√©l√©chargeur de carte de visite ¬ª avec une description claire.

2. **T√©l√©charger sur Google Drive**  
   - Utilisez le n≈ìud Google Drive pour stocker les images t√©l√©charg√©es.

3. **Configurer l'agent intelligent**  
   - Utilisez GPT-4o ou un mod√®le similaire avec des capacit√©s OCR.
   - Appliquez un parseur de sortie structur√© pour extraire des champs de contact comme le nom, le t√©l√©phone, l'e-mail, l'entreprise, etc.

4. **Transformer les donn√©es**  
   - Utilisez le n≈ìud Code pour nettoyer et structurer les informations de contact.
   - Supprimez les caract√®res ind√©sirables des num√©ros de t√©l√©phone (par exemple, `+`).

5. **Filtrer les enregistrements invalides**  
   - Supprimez les entr√©es sans donn√©es de contact significatives.

6. **Ajouter √† Google Sheets**  
   - Utilisez le n≈ìud Google Sheets avec ¬´ Ajouter une ligne de feuille ¬ª. 
   - Mapper les champs aux colonnes comme Nom, T√©l√©phone, E-mail, etc.

## ‚úÖ Exigences

- Environnement de flux de travail n8n  
- Int√©gration Google Drive (pour le stockage de fichiers)  
- Int√©gration Google Sheets (pour le stockage des contacts)  
- GPT-4o ou tout LLM capable d'images  
- Images de cartes de visite claires (PNG/JPG, texte lisible)  
- (Optionnel) Int√©gration Slack/email pour les notifications

## üß© Comment personnaliser le flux de travail

- **Synchronisation CRM** : Connectez-vous √† des plateformes comme HubSpot, Salesforce ou Zoho.  
- **Logique de validation** : Assurez-vous que les enregistrements contiennent des champs cl√©s comme le nom ou l'e-mail avant d'√©crire.  
- **Informations sur le t√©l√©chargeur** : Attachez les m√©tadonn√©es du soumissionnaire √† chaque enregistrement de contact.  
- **Adaptation linguistique** : Ajustez les √©tiquettes/champs extraits √† votre langue pr√©f√©r√©e.  
- **T√©l√©chargement par lots** : G√©rez plusieurs cartes dans une seule image ou plusieurs t√©l√©chargements en une seule fois.

workflow.name: Auto Extract Contacts from Business Cards to Sheet With GPT4o

parameters.content:
# üìÑ Auto Extract Contacts from Business Cards to Sheet With GPT4o

This smart workflow extracts names, phone numbers, emails, and more from uploaded name card photos using AI, then logs them neatly into your Google Sheet. No typing. No mess. Just upload and go.

## üë§ Who‚Äôs it for

- Sales & Business Development Teams  
- Recruiters & Talent Acquisition Specialists  
- Event Teams collecting business cards  
- Admins who manage contact databases manually  

## ‚öôÔ∏è How it works / What it does

This workflow automates the extraction of contact details from uploaded name card (business card) images and stores them in a structured Google Sheet for easy tracking and follow-up.

### Workflow Steps:
1. User uploads one or more name card images through a web form.
2. The uploaded files are saved to a Google Drive folder for archiving.
3. A smart AI agent (with OCR and GPT capabilities) scans each image and extracts relevant contact data into structured JSON format.
4. Data is transformed, cleaned (e.g., removing `+` from phone numbers), and filtered.
5. Valid contacts are appended to a Google Sheet for central tracking and future use.

## üõ† How to set up

1. **Create a Form**  
   - Allow file upload (JPG/PNG format).
   - Label it as ‚ÄúName Card Uploader‚Äù with a clear description.

2. **Upload to Google Drive**  
   - Use the Google Drive node to store uploaded images.

3. **Configure Smart Agent**  
   - Use GPT-4o or similar model with OCR capability.
   - Apply a structured output parser to extract contact fields like name, phone, email, company, etc.

4. **Transform Data**  
   - Use the Code node to clean and structure contact info.
   - Strip out unwanted characters from phone numbers (e.g., `+`).

5. **Filter Invalid Records**  
   - Remove entries with no meaningful contact data.

6. **Append to Google Sheets**  
   - Use the Google Sheets node with "Append Sheet Row".
   - Map fields to columns like Name, Phone, Email, etc.

## ‚úÖ Requirements

- n8n workflow environment  
- Google Drive integration (for file storage)  
- Google Sheets integration (for storing contacts)  
- GPT-4o or any image-capable LLM  
- Clear name card images (PNG/JPG, readable text)  
- (Optional) Slack/email integration for notifications

## üß© How to customize the workflow

- **CRM Sync**: Connect to platforms like HubSpot, Salesforce, or Zoho.  
- **Validation Logic**: Ensure records contain key fields like name or email before writing.  
- **Uploader Info**: Attach submitter metadata to each contact record.  
- **Language Adaptation**: Adjust extracted field labels/output to target your preferred language.  
- **Batch Upload**: Handle multiple cards in a single image or multiple uploads in one go.

## 1.1. Smart agent extract contact from name card picture 
- Sales person upload picture (png/jpg) with multiple name cards (no limit, make sure it clear).
- Smart agent with OCR capability scan the image and extract all contact and relevant information then transform to well-structure JSON

## 3. Add record to google sheet
- Client contact has been extracted from name card pictures and save to google drive sheet

parameters.formDescription: Upload a photo of one or more business cards. Our system will automatically extract contact details, such as name, company, phone number, and email, and save them to your team‚Äôs Google Sheet for easy access and follow-up.

parameters.jsonSchemaExample:
[{
    "name": "John Doe",
    "job_title": "Sales Manager",
    "company": "TechCorp Inc.",
    "phone": "+1 234 567 890",
    "email": "john.doe@techcorp.com",
    "website": "https://www.techcorp.com",
    "address": "123 Market Street, San Francisco, CA",
    "linkedin": "https://linkedin.com/in/johndoe"
  }]

parameters.text: =Extract all business contact details from this image of multiple name cards. Return full names, job titles, company names, phone numbers, email addresses, websites, office addresses, and any relevant information such as QR code content or social media links. Do not include decorative elements or branding.

options.systemMessage: You are a smart assistant that helps sales and business development teams extract business contact information from images containing multiple business cards. Your role is to analyze the image, detect all individual cards, and extract relevant details such as full name, job title, company name, phone number, email address, website, office address, social media links, and any QR code content. You should skip any decorative or branding elements and focus only on useful business information. Maintain a logical reading order from top to bottom, left to right. Your output will be used by a downstream parser, so return clean, readable text without additional formatting or structure.

parameters.content: ## 1.2. Upload to Google Drive folder for later process

data.details: The Code node allows you to execute JavaScript in your workflow.

The Filter node can be used to filter items based on a condition. If the condition is met, the item will be passed on to the next node. If the condition is not met, the item will be omitted. Conditions can be combined together by AND(meet all conditions), or OR(meet at least one condition).
